member.name: WS_REQUEST_SECURITY_TOKEN_PROPERTY
member.summary: Specifies a property for requesting a security token from an issuer.

member.name: WS_REQUEST_SECURITY_TOKEN_PROPERTY.value
member.summary: A pointer to the value. The pointer must have an alignment compatible with the type of the property.

member.name: WS_REQUEST_SECURITY_TOKEN_PROPERTY.valueSize
member.summary: The size in bytes of the memory pointed to by value.
